com.vedantatree.redmineconnector
Class URLBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.vedantatree.redmineconnector.URLBuilder

public class URLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

This object builds the URL for various operations performed using Redmine Restlet services. This comes in existence to centralize the logic of URL building at one place, as, pattern of URL is same for all type of objects.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Mohit Gupta [mohit.gupta@vedantatree.com]

buildURLToCreateObject

public java.lang.String buildURLToCreateObject(java.lang.Class<?> objectType)
This method will build the URL to create the object of specified type.

Parameters:
objectType - object type for which URL needs to be built
Returns:
URL for creating the object of specified type

buildURLToUpdateObject

public java.lang.String buildURLToUpdateObject(java.lang.Class<?> objectType,
                                               java.lang.Object objectId)
This method builds the URL to update an object of given type

Parameters:
objectType - Type of object which needs to be updated
objectId - Id of the object which needs to be updated
Returns:
URL for updating the object for given type and ID

This method builds the URL to delete an object of given type

objectId - Id of the object which needs to be deleted

buildURLToGetObjectById

public java.lang.String buildURLToGetObjectById(java.lang.Class<?> objectType,
                                                java.lang.Object objectId,
                                                java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> includes)
This method builds the URL to retrieve an object from Redmine for given criteria

Parameters:
objectType - Type of object to retrieve
objectId - Id of the object to Retrieve
includes - Collection of 'includes' criteria string. These type of objects should be included with retrieved object (if applicable)
Returns:
URL for retrieving the object for given criteria

buildURLToGetObjectsList

public java.lang.String buildURLToGetObjectsList(java.lang.Class<?> objectType,
                                                 java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> includes,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filters)
This method builds the URL to retrieve a list of objects from Redmine for given criteria

Parameters:
objectType - Type of objects to retrieve
includes - Collection of 'includes' criteria string. These type of objects should be included with retrieved object (if applicable)
filters - Collections of 'filters' criteria key<>value pair. These filters should be applicable to the list returned by Redmine.
Returns:
URL for retrieving the list of objects for given criteria
